ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
8 Cameras: 4*CMOS Outdoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance, Low Illumination 0.1 Lux, Metal vandal proof & water proof;; 4*indoor dome camera with Microphone, 1/3" SHARP CCD, 600 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on).
8 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time Recording+Playback, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs. 2 USB port for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Professional CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & 30FPS D1 Real-Time Recording+Playback, (8 Cameras) 4 Cameras 650TVL, 4 Cameras 600TVL build-in Microphone, iPhone Android Viewable
